channel.title: CVE Feed for Octopus Deploy -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Octopus Deploy -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1904|2024-09-18T07:09:21.166Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server it is possible for the OpenID client secret to be logged in clear text during the configuration of Octopus Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-2975|2024-09-18T06:55:51.479Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: A race condition was identified through which privilege escalation was possible in certain configurations.

item.title: CVE-2023-4509|2024-09-18T07:12:55.561Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: It is possible for an API key to be logged in clear text in the audit log file after an invalid login attempt.

item.title: CVE-2024-1656|2024-09-11T04:05:31.487Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: Affected versions of Octopus Server had a weak content security policy.

item.title: CVE-2024-7998|2024-08-21T05:30:35.851Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server OIDC cookies were using the wrong expiration time which could result in them using the maximum lifespan.

item.title: CVE-2023-4509|2024-08-02T07:31:05.976Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: It is possible for an API key to be logged in clear text in the audit log file after an invalid login attempt.

item.title: CVE-2024-6972|2024-08-01T21:45:38.363Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server under certain circumstances it is possible for sensitive variables to be printed in the task log in clear-text.

item.title: CVE-2024-2975|2024-08-01T19:32:42.513Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: A race condition was identified through which privilege escalation was possible in certain configurations.

item.title: CVE-2024-6972|2024-07-25T14:56:32.509Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server under certain circumstances it is possible for sensitive variables to be printed in the task log in clear-text.

item.title: CVE-2024-4811|2024-07-25T04:46:43.523Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server under certain conditions, a user with specific role assignments can access restricted project artifacts.

item.title: CVE-2023-4509|2024-06-04T17:27:23.930Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: It is possible for an API key to be logged in clear text in the audit log file after an invalid login attempt.

item.title: CVE-2024-4226|2024-06-04T17:55:44.760Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: It was identified that in certain versions of Octopus Server, that a user created with no permissions could view all users, user roles and permissions. This functionality was removed in versions of Octopus Server after the fixed versions listed.

item.title: CVE-2024-4456|2024-06-04T17:55:09.003Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server with certain access levels it was possible to embed a Cross-Site Scripting payload on the audit page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2975|2024-04-09T01:02:46.880Z -- octopus%20deploy -- octopus%20server
item.description: A race condition was identified through which privilege escalation was possible in certain configurations.

item.description: A race condition was identified through which privilege escalation was possible in certain configurations.

item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server under certain circumstances it is possible for sensitive variables to be printed in the task log in clear-text.

item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server under certain conditions, a user with specific role assignments can access restricted project artifacts.

item.description: In affected versions of Octopus Server with certain access levels it was possible to embed a Cross-Site Scripting payload on the audit page.

item.description: It was identified that in certain versions of Octopus Server, that a user created with no permissions could view all users, user roles and permissions. This functionality was removed in versions of Octopus Server after the fixed versions listed.
